country.text: You are the first user to access the mpf-admin and thus will be granted administrative privileges.

[p]The MPF password strength is based on simple rules and they are as follow:[/p] [list] [*]Special characters: !@#$%^&*?_~ [/*] [*]Uppercase letters[/*] [*]Numbers[/*] [*]More than two words seperated by a space[/*] [*]A length of more than 8 characters total[/*] [/list]
